reproduce redistribute or re-sell this pattern for more copyright information please see www cherryheart co uk/p/copyright continued from layout page 1 cherry heart designs 0 my classic granny square us for a full photo tutorial of this square pattern please see my classic granny square under terms tutorial links on page 2 please note you ll only need to follow the first 3 rounds of the tutorial make a total of 672 squares using colours as given in the blanket squares layout on page 7 ✽ please also read the joining section below before you begin 4ch slip_stitch to 1st chain to make a loop round 1 4ch 3dc into loop 2ch 3 times 2dc into loop slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 2 slip_stitch into space 4ch 3dc in same space 1ch * 3dc 2ch 3dc into next space 1ch * repeat from * to * twice more 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 3 slip_stitch into space 4ch 3dc into same space *1ch 3dc in 1ch space 1ch 3dc 2ch 3dc into corner space repeat from * to * twice more 1ch 3dc in 1ch space 1ch 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch joining this blanket is constructed using the join as you go jayg technique this technique will require some of the chain stitches in round 3 to be replaced with joining slip stitches jss in order to join each square to a previous square in the blanket for a full photo tutorial using this technique please see join as you go jayg technique under the tutorial links on page 2 ✽ if you would like to make the squares separately and use another joining method you can
